text: Annual Report 2023-24 Jio Financial Services Limited. Revenues for FY 2023-24 increased to ₹1,342 crore, representing a growth of 15% over the previous year.
Net profit for FY 2023-24 stood at ₹560 crore, compared to ₹487 crore in the previous year. This represents a year-on-year growth of 15%.
Total assets as of March 31, 2024 were ₹7,890 crore, compared to ₹6,570 crore as of March 31, 2023, representing a 20% increase year-over-year.
The company's dividend payout for FY 2023-24 was ₹15 per share, representing a dividend yield of 2.5% based on the closing share price on March 31, 2024.
During FY 2022-23, the company reported revenues of ₹1,167 crore and a net profit of ₹487 crore.
The operating expenses for FY 2022-23 were ₹580 crore, representing 49.7% of total revenue compared to 52.3% in the previous year.
The company's return on equity (ROE) for FY 2022-23 was 12.8%, compared to 11.5% in the previous year, showing improved profitability.
